Posts.Content: Mar 22, 2008 07:19PM rdawud wrote: Nala, I had a MRI guided biopsy in January 08. I believe it took about a week to schedule the appt. The procedure was similar to the original MRI except for a doctor will perform a detailed biopsy once the MRI is completed.  The biopsy is done while you are still on the MRI machine so they can accurately biopsy the area in question.  My results were benign. If you need more details let me know.  Stay Positive! Ro Ro
Posts.Title: MRI Guided Biopsy nala24 Blinx

Posts.Content: Mar 22, 2008 07:40PM rdawud wrote: Nala, I think I was moved in the MRI machine only once. They put a clip in place during the biopsy and did a mammo following the procedure to confirm placement. Let me know if you have any additional questions. Ro
